title: grpc injection error:  org.demo.HelloGrpc cannot be injected into org.demo.HelloGrpcServiceTest#helloGrpc
body:
### Describe the bug

Expected: Grpc injection works.

Hello service should work
![image](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/assets/56970398/ee574c64-afdb-4bad-91f0-176d85ae79ff)



Actual : 

See error stack trace below




### Expected behavior

HelloGrpc service must respond from bloomRpc

Injection in Test classes must not throw error

### Actual behavior

Stack trace:

```log

```

### How to Reproduce?

To reproduce: 
```sh
git clone git@github.com:anborg/corp-users-q-rest-grpc.git

# Generate grpc java  -- protos stored externally, in future .proto will be in a different repo
0_generate_grpc_java.bat

# run 
dev.bat
#invoke tests by pressing 'r'

# To this project, in future I'll have to add resteasy-reactive with hibernate-reactive & r2dbc
```
